interface.name: raid_domtrans_mdadm
interface.summary: Execute software raid tools in the mdadm domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: raid_manage_mdadm_pid
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the mdadm pid files.

desc.p: Create, read, write, and delete the mdadm pid files.
Added for use in the init module.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
